MonsterTrait.Name: Amphibious
MonsterTrait.Text: Gar can breathe air and water.

MonsterTrait.Name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: If Gar fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MonsterTrait.Name: Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
Gar is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following druid spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): mending, resistance, shape water
• 1st level (4 slots): create or destroy water, cure wounds, fog cloud, thunderwave • 2nd level (3 slots): darkvision, hold person, protection from poison • 3rd level (3 slots): call lightning, sleet storm, tidal wave • 4th level (3 slots): control water, ice storm • 5th level (1 slot): scrying

MonsterTrait.Name: Water Walk
MonsterTrait.Text: Gar can stand and move on liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground.

MonsterTrait.Name: Watery Fall
MonsterTrait.Text: When Gar drops to 0 hit points, his body collapses into a pool of inky water that rapidly disperses. Anything he was wearing or carrying is left behind.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: Gar makes two melee attacks, one with his claw and one with Drown.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until the grapple ends, Gar can't attack other creatures with his claw.

MonsterAction.Name: Drown
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage.
